athletics.name: Athletics
athletics.description: Physical activities such as climbing, jumping, and swimming.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: The ability to move silently and avoid detection.

persuasion.name: Persuasion
persuasion.description: The art of convincing others through speech and negotiation.

survival.name: Survival
survival.description: Skills related to wilderness navigation, foraging, and tracking.

melee.name: Melee
melee.description: Proficiency in hand-to-hand combat and the use of melee weapons.

ranged.name: Ranged
ranged.description: Skill in using ranged weapons such as bows and thrown weapons.

thievery.name: Thievery
thievery.description: Skills related to lockpicking, pickpocketing, and other clandestine activities.

tracking.name: Tracking
tracking.description: The ability to follow tracks and find paths through the wilderness.

farming.name: Farming
farming.description: The skill of cultivating crops and raising animals for food.

cooking.name: Cooking
cooking.description: The ability to prepare food and create meals.

fishing.name: Fishing
fishing.description: The skill of catching fish and other aquatic creatures.

navigation.name: Navigation
navigation.description: The art of determining one's position and planning a route, especially at sea.

animalHandling.name: Animal Handling
animalHandling.description: The ability to train and care for animals.

camping.name: Camping
camping.description: The skill of setting up and maintaining a campsite, including shelter building and fire making.

alchemy.name: Alchemy
alchemy.description: The ability to create potions and elixirs from various ingredients.

arcana.name: Arcana
arcana.description: Knowledge of magical lore and spellcraft.

history.name: History
history.description: Understanding of historical events, cultures, and legends.

herbalism.name: Herbalism
herbalism.description: The study of plants and their properties, often for medicinal purposes.

jewelcraft.name: Jewelcraft
jewelcraft.description: The skill of creating and appraising jewelry and gemstones.

smithing.name: Smithing
smithing.description: The ability to forge and repair metal items, including weapons and armor.

spellcraft.name: Spellcraft
spellcraft.description: The knowledge and practice of casting and understanding spells.

tailoring.name: Tailoring
tailoring.description: The skill of making and repairing clothing and fabric items.

sailing.name: Sailing
sailing.description: The art of operating a sailing vessel.

carpentry.name: Carpentry
carpentry.description: The skill of working with wood to create structures and items.

brewing.name: Brewing
brewing.description: The art of making beers, wines, ales, and other beverages.
